QuoteText: Who from the Pentagon died 9/11/01? Besides, you don't know what the rationale was for killing people at the Towers. You don't even know who killed them. The US gov't has yet to release any conclusive evidence to support their accusation of Bin Ladin.
ResponseText: I don't understand why you are asking this question. Are you trying to make a point here? Do you think there is enough evidence to show that the US invaded Iraq? Basically I'm asking do you believe what our government and media say or do you need to see it with your own eyes to believe it.
